functions.tag: {EquipmentType:"meleeWeapon",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"graceful",display:{Name:"\"§6Veille finale\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Contemplatif, quant aux lendemains inaccessibles;\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais impatient tout autant que désespéré par la fin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Contemplative, as for the unattainable tomorrows;\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but impatient as well as desperate for the end.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a4 §7RES§a1\"}"]},Damage:0,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:fire_aspect",lvl:4s},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:4s},{id:"minecraft:smite",lvl:2s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.attack_damage,Name:generic.attack_damage,Amount:5.83,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,10003,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.attack_speed,Name:generic.attack_speed,Amount:0.42999999999999994,Operation:1,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,20003,0,10000]},{AttributeName:generic.max_health,Name:generic.max_health,Amount:2.0,Operation:0,Slot:mainhand,UUID:[I;0,30003,0,10000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",display:{Name:"\"§6Eclat du Neleptron\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Jadis forgé avec les fragments de la lumière\"}","{\"text\":\"§7sans fin, son éclat est déflagrant.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Once forged with the fragments of the endless\"}","{\"text\":\"§7light, its brilliance is deflagrating.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7RES§a1 §7SPD§a1\"}"]},Damage:10,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:blast_protection",lvl:4s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:6.73,Operation:0,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,10001,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:1.05,Operation:1,Slot:head,UUID:[I;0,20001,0,20000]}]}

{EquipmentType:"armor",Rarity:"leg",Manufacturer:"delightful",display:{Name:"\"§6Perpétuelle apogée\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Lèves-toi, grandis, élèves-toi, plus encore\"}","{\"text\":\"§7et sans relâche pour atteindre l'ultime finalité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Rise up, grow up, raise up, more and more\"}","{\"text\":\"§7and relentlessly to reach the ultimate goal.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a4\"}"]},Damage:20,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:protection",lvl:2s},{id:"minecraft:mending",lvl:1s}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:generic.armor,Name:generic.armor,Amount:8.64,Operation:0,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,10002,0,20000]},{AttributeName:generic.armor_toughness,Name:generic.armor_toughness,Amount:3.8,Operation:1,Slot:chest,UUID:[I;0,20002,0,20000]}]}
